title: Large-Scale Critical Thinking-Based University English Education Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and fundamental social domain knowledge related to job roles
context.additional_context: Conducted in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones, with a flexible learning schedule designed to accommodate working professionals' work hours.

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze English texts on diverse social issues using analytical techniques and provide logical justifications.
Learners revise and improve English project reports based on peer feedback to finalize deliverables.
Learners design job-related English presentation materials and specify persuasive strategies reflecting audience analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
